Query.Sql: select NHSNumber, GeneratedRecordIdentifier, ArrivalDate, ArrivalTime, SourceofReferralForAE -- Referrer code is the code of the person making the referral request from omop_staging.sus_AE where SourceofReferralForAE is not null

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
The time (using a 24 hour clock) that is of relevance to an ACTIVITY.
Explanation.Origin: ARRIVAL TIME AT ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT

Explanation.Description: The source of referral of each Accident and Emergency Episode.
Explanation.Origin: SOURCE OF REFERRAL FOR A and E
